link_desc:
Uses a cronjob, and a script, scrapes apcaccess and feeds it into zabbix with zabbix_sender.

requires UNIX-like environment with a bourne-like shell, apcupsd/apcacccess needs to be setup and working.

see github for instructions

Comes with script, cronjob, and template:

features:

Data Collected:

* UPS Load

* Time/Percent Remaining
* Battery/ Line voltages
* Last Transfter Message
* status message

* timestamp from the battery

* Display message for screens with DATE, VERSION, DRIVER, UPSNAME, SERIALNO, BATTDATE, NOMPOWER, and FIRMWARE. This is for auditing

Checks performed
* Low Battery warning at 10%, Critical at %5
* Info event when switching to and from battery power.

* check for hardware errors, such as unplug, missing battery, bad battery

Graphs and record keeping stats

* Battery time remaining and %
* Battery and Line Votlages
* "isonline" graph, that computes overall availability of line power, and shows a timeline of when UPS is not in nominal operation.

Screen:
Screen template that gives an at a glance overall view of the battery. Graphs, records on model, firmware and serial number, voltages, charge % and time, and isonline in a convienant 3x2 screen that can be used for displays.
author: GI_Jack
